name: Dungeon of Souls (v.1.0)
description:
Glad to present you my game! It's isometric soulslike rpg! Game is currently in development but will soon be released on Steam! If you liked the demo, the best support would be a donation and  to show it to your friends. For a donation of 5 dollars or more, you will receive a key to the steam version of the game when it is released!(most importantly do not forget to send me your email).

You have infinite health to consider all aspects of the game!

Control

esc - quit game 

wasd - movement

left mouse button - attack

space - dash

i - inventory

u - skills

1- aoe spell

2- buff (+dmg)

click on the mouse wheel to take aim

Contact with me: 13371337dddgmail.com

Do not forget to press the  button E near the well at the beginning of the game to save the game!
